Reviews.Title: A good monitor for a backup camera system or to show videos in your vehicle!
Reviews.Author: jjceo

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_moNO4PARUUDVGVcurrentClick) { return cv_moNO4PARUUDVGVcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 3:10 MinsThis is a nice 7 inch LCD screen for use in your vehicle as a monitor for a backup camera. It can also be used to show video from other sources in your car but it does not have sound output. The remote control allows you to switch between two video sources. This is a nice looking screen and it offers to you multiple methods of mounting it and the mounting hardware is supplied.You may want to consider having this monitor professionally installed as there is some wiring to be done and any time you are wiring items into your car you must be careful. This is even a recommendation from the supplier so please consider it if you are not skilled at doing such work yourself.I had mine wired to a Taotronics TT-CC17 backup license plate camera which also came with the appropriate wiring harness. I put together a video of the unit and its accessories for your information.What's in the box?* The screen itself* A plastic mounting snap in frame for the monitor* A wiring harness with a fused power line and two video plugs ready to connect to a backup camera and another possible video input source. The harness is 6 feet long.* An instruction manual* A remote control* A metal mounting stand for mounting the screen to make it adjustable in the angle of the monitor viewing for the driver.* A double-sided adhesive mounting pad to mount the stand if you do not want to drill any holes.This is a nicely packaged monitor and it comes with all of the accessories you need for a professional installation. I am using it for a backup camera like I said but it can also be used to show videos in your vehicle. I rated it as a 5 star item.I was supplied a sample for test and evaluation and I promised to provide a fair and honest review.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Quality LCD Widescreen
Reviews.Author: DubaluBubaluGubalu
Reviews.Content: Definitely recommend this for anyone interested in installing their own rear backup camera system.  As mentioned in title above the quality is absolutely clear as is, not high definition but still as good. Very happy with it. I bought this as my first install rear backup camera system. It took me awhile to find my truck's wire location but once it was found it was easy to tap in. As for package wise, it came in a very good box with clear instruction and all the tool you'll need.

Reviews.Title: Very capable backup LCD monitor
Reviews.Author: Nuknuk
Reviews.Content: The TT-CM04 is a great value high-resolution TFT LCD monitor.  It is not high definition but is detailed enough to work as an excellent backup LCD  screen. The monitor automatically switch to the backup camera when it sense you shifted to reverse..Specs:- 7" screen size- 16:9 aspect- NTSC / PAL- 12V, 8W- 2 video inputsThe LCD monitor came with a remote control.  You can easily switch with the remote from the backup camera mode (V2) to what you installed on V2, whether it is a DVD player or a game console. Just be aware that the LCD screen don't have any speakers built-in so you would need to connect the audio to your car stereo or a separate speaker.  Aside from the remote, the LCD screen has physical buttons to control power, video inputs, and menu for adjusting screen brightness, etc.The screen is intended to be hard wired to work with your backup camera.  It is not for a quick snap installation, a professional like an automotive radio installer is recommended. Of course you can do a DIY if you are pretty handy with these things.My setup is paired with a TT-CC17 camera.  I can see the wide angle image, from left to right and how close the rear bumper is from an object with the LCD screen.  The guide area lines on the lower part of the screen with the red line telling you are almost just a foot away from bumping to an object.  The green lines are about three to five away approximately.  The guide lines will not appear when you are on V1.Sample item provided by the distributor for evaluation review.

Reviews.Title: Gets the job done!
Reviews.Author: Stillie
Reviews.Content: Look folks, it's a 7" monitor that you're likely installing to entertain your children. Do you really want to put something with iRetina like quality within reach of a 4 year old armed with any manner of stickiness?No, probably not. I bought two of these for this exact purpose and installed them in the headrest of my GMC Canyon. They performed flawlessly and worked right out of the box. No muss, no fuss. Kids are happy, daddy is happy, we're all happy.Seller is excellent as well. Product was delivered a full 3 days ahead of schedule.

Reviews.Title: Great value for price and good quality..
Reviews.Author: VellsMaster
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my F150 with a camper shell since it had a huge blind spot for backing up.  Bought this along with the Tao Tronics CC17 camera.Got it installed in Best Buy for $100 (well worth the money).You can either set it up to be on all the time or turn on only when you switch the gear to Reverse (While not in reverse, the display powers off, which is a nice feature).  It has two video inputs, apparently 2nd input could be connected to a DVD player or a second video camera.I have a Tesla Model S and a Nissan Leaf.  The camera in Tesla is of course top notch, with great day time picture quality.  Leaf is a bit mediocre.  But the night vision in Tao tronics camera is great compared to both my other cars.  But daylight camera quality is so so.. not sure if it is the display or the camera, but the colors seem to be off a bit.  But for purposes of backing up, it is quite functional and adequate.I'm happy with the purchase overall and will recommend this!

Reviews.Title: perfect size for a rear view monitor
Reviews.Author: wolvern
Reviews.Content: very easy to install and with the quick disconnect i can move it with ease. I wish I would have bought this first instead of the 4 inch monitor

Reviews.Title: Great monitor
Reviews.Author: Chang X. Li
Reviews.Content: It works great with  "TaoTronics® TT-CC17 Waterproof Color CMOS Car License Plate Frame Mount Rear View Backup Camera with 8 IR LED Night Vision (170 Degree Viewing Angle / " on my minivan.

Reviews.Title: Good Video
Reviews.Author: Camper
Reviews.Content: Great quality video, even in the dark.Only thing I don't like about it is it doesn't stick well. I had to screw it into the dashboard.

Reviews.Title: Don't Look Back
Reviews.Author: A. Larson
Reviews.Content: Very good productA good buy.Most people will need to have assistance for the installation.  Better than most original equipment camera and monitor setup s

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Greg
Reviews.Content: Bought these to install in my vehicle for a 20+ hour road trip with the kids. The displays did take some time to acquire the audio/video signal, but once they did, they worked great.

Reviews.Title: I now have eyes in the back of my head!
Reviews.Author: Cynthea Frongillo
Reviews.Content: I love this screen.  It gives a clear, and encompassing view of what's behind me, and in my Subaru outback it rests nicely below the radio on the back of the gear shift space.

Reviews.Title: Great Product! Great Price!
Reviews.Author: Adam S.
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to be used as the monitor for the Esky EC170-07 Backup Camera. Everything worked right away and 3 months later still works perfectly. I scrapped the base and modified the existing rear view mirror mount to hold the monitor. It is installed in my work van which the rear view mirror was not needed. The monitors picture is very clear and crisp. It would work great as a video display for a DVD player also. The screen rotate feature is nice too. It will flip the picture horizontally and vertically.

Reviews.Title: Nice monitor
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: I used this for a back-up camera on my '98 f150.  It has a nice price, and an even nicer view of the rearview.  Bad instructions though, you'll probably need to look up how to hook it up on "the youtube".

Reviews.Title: Very Satisfied Customer
Reviews.Author: DEERHUNTER30
Reviews.Content: When looking for a back up camera for my F150, I was very hesitant to buy some after market screen and camera.  I spent several hours reading reviews and gathering as much information as I could before deciding to buy.  With that said....This screen exceeded my expectations for its price.  It is very clear and very easy to install.  The instructions is not the best...but trust me....If you have any common sense at all, you should have no problem.  I purchased the screen with a taotronics back up camera.  They both pair well and I have used them extensively.  I would recommend this screen to anyone who is looking to install a backup camera in their vehicle without selling your first born to do so.  I do not work for taotronics or amazon.  I'm simply a very satisfied customer.

Reviews.Title: by franco
Reviews.Author: Francisco A. Doce
Reviews.Content: Bright and wide screen, easy to install, I recommend this for everyone  interested installing their own backup camera system. Very happy having this.

Reviews.Title: nice unit for the price
Reviews.Author: john a.
Reviews.Content: I was surprised on how well the picture is on this monitor.  Granted it is not HD but is more than adequate for a back up montior.

Reviews.Title: headrest monitors
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I was needing, very good product.  Bright screens with small power consumption, extremely easy to place anywhere you would like to.

Reviews.Title: Easy to install
Reviews.Author: Anthony Milostan
Reviews.Content: Works perfect and is easy to install. Fast shipping also. No issues with water at all. Got this so my wife would not smash my truck up when she drove it

Reviews.Title: Nice addition
Reviews.Author: John Hudson
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice unit and is pretty easy to install.  It would be even easier if the instructions were better, however, the tech. support is very good.

Reviews.Title: Decent screen, easy install
Reviews.Author: Rocky J. Wiggins
Reviews.Content: Easy install item, has remote, reverse screening. View quality is decent even though using a low end back up camera for it. Has slight horizontal lines, but thats probably due to alternator interferance since my radio picks it up as well if im charging anything through the cig. lighter

Reviews.Title: well spent money
Reviews.Author: brownbomer80
Reviews.Content: Even tho they are not name brand you can't tell that buy the picture they give off i have three of these in my car in a custom built front an rear console. I plan on buying more

Reviews.Title: unable to install
Reviews.Author: charityman
Reviews.Content: It would be extremely helpful if there were actual instructions with the unit. I'm trying to install it myself and I'm not sure which wire goes where. I found the bundle of wires going to the backup light. Have the pathway all figured out. Just not sure what to connect.Has anyone out there installed the camera and monitor yourself? Help would be appreciated.Once it's installed I'll revisit this review.

Reviews.Title: Purchase Reveiw
Reviews.Author: Alicia Winner
Reviews.Content: Thank you TaoTronics Team for your fast delivery and professionalism. Look forward to doing more business with you in the future.Alicia Winner GelnettAMAZING MACHINERYCleveland Tennessee

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Kirk
Reviews.Content: I would not recommend this item to anybody! Very cheap wiring, poor picture quality, wireless didn't work had to go out and buy cables to hard wire it. THE EXACT THING I WAS TRYING TO AVOID BY PURCHASING THE WIRELESS SETUP!!!!

ProductInfo.Name: TaoTronics® TT-CM04 7-inch TFT LCD Widescreen Headrest Car Rear View Monitor w/ Headrest Frame, Universal Stand and Remote Control
